product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Cyclone Compression Sack - X Large - Special Buy
long_description: The X-large ALPS Mountaineering Cyclone Compression Sack compresses both diameter and length to make your gear more compact in your backpack. Cylindrical sack is well-suited to being strapped on the outside of a pack yet also fits nicely inside your pack. Constructed of tough ripstop nylon fabric with strong 3/4 in. webbing straps; bottom handle for easy carrying. 3 straps wrap around the circumference of the sack to reduce the diameter; 1 strap runs lengthwise to shorten the sack. Special buy.
short_description: The X-large ALPS Mountaineering Cyclone Compression Sack compresses both diameter and length to make your gear more compact in your backpack.
